result.execSummary:
The defendant James L Powell #555424 was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess w/Intent-Cocaine (>5-15g) [Modifiers: Repeater], a class E felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1m)(cm)2.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes:
Absolute sobriety.
No contact with K.S. unless approved by agent.

SAFE Program
Assessment, treatment, and counseling as recommended.
DNA sample w/ surcharge.

PLEA:

Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: 
15CF587:
Ct. 1 (Battery-Domestic Abuse-Domestic Abuse Repeater-Repeater)>> 4 Years WSPS, 2 Years IC and 2 Years ES, concurrent to all Counts. CONDITIONS: Assessment/treatment/counseling as recommended, Complete the SAFE Program, AODA and any follow up, Absolute Sobriety, No Contact with K.S. unless approved by agent, Court Costs, DNA Sample and Surcharge, 2 Domestic Abuse Surcharges. COURT finds 98 days credit. 
Not eligible for programming in 15CF587.

Ct. 2 (Intimidate Victim/Dissuade Reporting-Domestic Abuse-Domestic Abuse Repeater-Repeater)>> 4 Years WSPS, 2 Years IC and 2 Years ES, concurrent to all Counts. 15CF689:
